name: Rainbow Maze (Beta) UPDATE IN 48HRS)
description:
Rainbow maze is a small but large maze game which is avaliable for linux and windows and we are currently making changes to the game so that it can be added to twitch streams so that twitch users can stream the game and it will allow anyone to play the game while it is being streamed.

This is our first game we have made and therefor is only a beta version and would love all feedback and any error you get. you can join our community discord https://discord.gg/8Ufrzpv where you will find a section that has been made for the game.
